entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
